ygData.subject: Re: OOC r/l musical bards?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, In response to So we are all real good online Bards and have excellent musical abilities to the point of powerful magic, etc.  But what about in /ooc real
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,

In response to

"So we are all real good online Bards and have
excellent musical abilities to the point of powerful
magic, etc. But what about in /ooc real life?
Anyone have any talent or interest?"

I've played music from a very early age started
banging on guitar at 4 or so and got my first bass at
13, I started a very successful Punk band for almost
10 yrs, toured Europe, Australia, Canada, and the USA
multiple times. In addition to the touring we
recorded 5 cd's had one of our songs played on 30
commercial stations across the US and even had our
video get on MTV (yuck). Im not playing in the band
anymore but do still greatly enjoy music and my bard,
my new profession is in the game industry. Well
there's my 2 copper's worth.

best regards,

Lindros Siversong
25th Circle Bard E'ci
Archon Lords of Light
